import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SocialLink from "./SocialLink"; export default function MovieDecs({ item }) { return (

{item.name}

{item.subname}

4/5 (1,200 voted)
  • Status {item.status}
  • IMDb {item.imdb}
  • Actor {item.actor}
  • Genre Drama, Anime, Romance
  • Year {item.year}
  • Nation {item.nation}
{/* Social Link */}
); }
